scripts.start: pnpm --filter gutenverse-core start & pnpm start:js & pnpm start:css
scripts.dev: pnpm --filter gutenverse-core dev && pnpm start:dev && pnpm build:css
scripts.build: pnpm --filter gutenverse-core build && pnpm build:js && pnpm build:css
scripts.development: gulp clean && pnpm --filter gutenverse-core development && pnpm dev && gulp release && pnpm pot && gulp zip
scripts.production: gulp clean && pnpm --filter gutenverse-core production && pnpm build && gulp release && pnpm pot && gulp zip
scripts.fix: npx eslint --fix ./src || echo "Formatting done! Please fix the remaining warnings and errors"
scripts.fix-pkg: npx eslint --fix ./gutenverse-core || echo "Formatting done! Please fix the remaining warnings and errors"
scripts.clean:package: rm -rf node_modules package-lock.json pnpm-lock.yaml gutenverse-core/node_modules gutenverse-core/package-lock.json gutenverse-core/pnpm-lock.yaml
